Human Resources Management.question: Considering the factor affecting recruitment, which one of the following given alternative is not a part of internal factors?
Human Resources Management.explanation: Socio-economic factors are external, not internal to the organization.

Human Resources Management.question: The personal manager acts as a ________ in case of friction between two employees, group of employees, superiors, subordinates and employees, and with the sole objective of maintaining industrial harmony.
Human Resources Management.explanation: A mediator resolves conflicts and promotes harmony.

Human Resources Management.question: ________ decisions are taken by line manager after matching the recruitment of a job with the qualification of candidates.
Human Resources Management.explanation: Placement refers to assigning the right person to the right job.

Human Resources Management.question: ________ is also considered as an extended work in sample. It incorporates individuals and group exercises designed to simulate the types of work which the candidate will be expected to do.
Human Resources Management.explanation: Assessment centers evaluate candidates through simulated work situations.

Human Resources Management.question: ________ is an integrated system design to improve the efficiency with which HR data is compiled. It makes HR records more useful to management by serving as a source of information.
Human Resources Management.explanation: HRIS systems help in storing and analyzing HR data efficiently.

Human Resources Management.question: Organizing tasks and responsibilities toward having the productive line and staff function unit of the work is called ________.
Human Resources Management.explanation: Job design defines how tasks are structured and assigned.

Human Resources Management.question: Professional organization search for the most suitable candidate and advise the company regarding filling up the position. Head hunters are also called ________.
Human Resources Management.explanation: Head hunters are often referred to as search consultants.

Human Resources Management.question: Which among the following is the internal factor that affects recruitment?
Human Resources Management.explanation: Organisational culture is an internal factor influencing recruitment.
